name: INGetRestaurantGuestIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for fetching information about the person making a reservation.

items.name: func confirm(getRestaurantGuest: INGetRestaurantGuestIntent, completion: (INGetRestaurantGuestIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can provide the guest information.

items.name: func handle(getRestaurantGuest: INGetRestaurantGuestIntent, completion: (INGetRestaurantGuestIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles returning the information about the user making the reservation.
